document_data.name: Ajimo Heikaru
document_data.mainbody: '''Ajimo Heikaru''' was a [[Wererat]] [[samurai]] in [[Ito-jo]] in [[1360 DR]].
document_data.History: Heikaru was the first son of the warlord of [[ito family]] but against his family's wishes he fall in love with [[Emi Towiki]] a kitchen worker. Distracted by his love he was negligent in rallying the clanâ€™s army when needed in [[647 DR]]. So the curse transformed him in a [[Wererat]] condemned to guard his lover room in caves deep the castle for eternity. At last in 1360 DR, an adventuring party hired by [[Michimori Uemon]] to recover the [[Seven Swords]] fought and destroyed him.
